description:
Move right and left to defend against the missiles and attacks of the Galaga aliens and the Galaga Commander.

Aliens attack in formations using a variety of attack patterns.

Rescue a captured fighter to combine with it, forming a Dual Fighter with twice the firepower!

Earn Perfect Bonuses more easily by using a Dual Fighter on the Challenging Stages!
name: Galaga™
disclaimer: You may need an additional compatible SD card or SDHC card with available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
